headline: Does Regeneron’s Choppy 2025 Share Price Reflect Its Long Term Growth Potential?
summary: If you have ever wondered whether Regeneron Pharmaceuticals is a smart buy at around $718 a share, you are not alone; investors are trying to figure out if the current price really reflects its long term potential. The stock has been choppy lately, down 7.9% over the last week but still up 11.5% over the past month, leaving it only slightly positive year to date at 0.4% and modestly higher over five years with a 50.6% gain. Much of this volatility has been tied to shifting sentiment around...
